# Target RE7
if(REF_BUILD_FRAMEWORK AND CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P EQUAL 8) # build-framework
	set(CMKR_TARGET RE7)
	set(RE7_SOURCES "")

	list(APPEND RE7_SOURCES
		"src/asdf.cpp"
	)

	list(APPEND RE7_SOURCES
		cmake.toml
	)

	set(CMKR_SOURCES ${RE7_SOURCES})
	add_library(RE7 SHARED)

	if(RE7_SOURCES)
		target_sources(RE7 PRIVATE ${RE7_SOURCES})
	endif()

	target_compile_definitions(RE7 PUBLIC
		${CMKR_TARGET}
		REFRAMEWORK_EXPORTS
		"REFRAMEWORK_GAME_NAME=\"${CMKR_TARGET}\""
	)

	if(DEVELOPER_MODE) # developer-mode
		target_compile_definitions(RE7 PUBLIC
			DEVELOPER
		)
	endif()

	target_compile_features(RE7 PUBLIC
		cxx_std_20
	)

	target_compile_options(RE7 PUBLIC
		"/GS-"
		"/bigobj"
		"/EHa"
	)

	target_include_directories(RE7 PUBLIC
		"shared/"
		"src/"
		"include/"
	)

	target_link_directories(RE7 PUBLIC
		"dependencies/openvr/lib/win64/"
	)

	target_link_libraries(RE7 PUBLIC
		${CMKR_TARGET}SDK
		utility
		asmjit::asmjit
		nlohmann_json
		spdlog
		lua
		sol2
		imgui
		minhook
		d3d11
		glm_static
		shlwapi
		openvr
		delayimp
	)

	set_target_properties(RE7 PROPERTIES
		OUTPUT_NAME
			dinput8
		LINK_FLAGS
			"/DELAYLOAD:openvr_api.dll"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
	)

	unset(CMKR_TARGET)
	unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
endif()

		"REFRAMEWORK_GAME_NAME=\"${CMKR_TARGET}\""

			DEVELOPER
		)
	endif()

		cxx_std_20
	)

		"/GS-"
		"/bigobj"
		"/EHa"
	)

		"shared/"
		"src/"
		"include/"
	)

	target_link_directories(RE8 PUBLIC
		"dependencies/openvr/lib/win64/"
	)

	target_link_libraries(RE8 PUBLIC
		${CMKR_TARGET}SDK
		utility
		asmjit::asmjit
		nlohmann_json
		spdlog
		lua
		sol2
		imgui
		minhook
		d3d11
		glm_static
		shlwapi
		openvr
		delayimp
	)

	set_target_properties(RE8 PROPERTIES
		OUTPUT_NAME
			dinput8
		LINK_FLAGS
			"/DELAYLOAD:openvr_api.dll"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
	)

	unset(CMKR_TARGET)
	unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
endif()

	)

		"/EHa"
	)

		"include/"

		openvr
		delayimp
	)

			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
		ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO
			"${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib/${CMKR_TARGET}"
	)

	unset(CMKR_TARGET)
	unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
endif()
